concept.title: 5333.105 Protests to the United States Court of Federal Claims (COFC)

conbody.p: The Air Force Commercial Litigation Field Support Center (AF/JACQ) serves as the Air Force agency counsel to the Department of Justice (DoJ) for protests at the COFC and assists the assigned DoJ attorney in defending Air Force interests. The contracting officer must inform AF/JACQ of any notice of protest at the COFC and provide support as requested by AF/JACQ. Also notify the SCO and the supporting field legal office.
